Choke

Assembling one collection requires these expenditures:

  • Music - On average ranges between $2 and $6.
  • Shipping - We use USPS's Media Mail service. The weight of our products brings the price to about $4.
  • Packaging - Supplies include cardboard paper, string, and ink. Cost adds up to about $2.
  • Mileage - On average ranges between $1 and $2.

Thus, Choke nets anywhere between $5 to $10 per order. Any money earned is strictly reinvested and used for the purchase of music and the growth of our collection.
